Pedantius Comœdia, olim Cantabrig. acta in Coll. Trin. Nunquàm antehàc typis evulgata. Forset, Edward, 1553?-1630, attributed name. Wingfield, Anthony, 1550?-1615?, attributed name. Hawkesworth, Walter, d. 1606, attributed name. Beard, Thomas, d. 1632, attributed name.
[4], 167, [1] p. : ill. (metal cut)
Excudebat W[illiam] S[tansby] impensis Roberti Mylbourn in Cœmeterio Paulino ad insigne Canis Leporarij, Londini : 1631.
Variously attributed to Edward Forset, to Anthony Wingfield, to Walter Hawkesworth, and to Thomas Beard. A satire on Gabriel Harvey?. Printer's name from STC. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======

Variously attributed to Edward Forset, to Anthony Wingfield, to Walter Hawkesworth, and to Thomas Beard. A satire on Gabriel Harvey?. Printer's name from STC. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
